title: Insta360's new action camera
tags: insta360 one x vs one x2
insta360 one x2 vs gopro max
description: Today Insta360 announced the One X2, a new 360-degree camera that replaces the One X from 2018. The X2 adds a full-color touchscreen, longer battery life, IPX8 water resistance, and even more AI-powered editing tools to its flagship consumer 360 camera. The Insta360 One X2 is available starting today for $429.99, about $30 more than the One X.  Learn more:   Subscribe:  Subscribe to Verge Science:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:
